short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modernizing the Way Executive Assistants Communicate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Executive Assistants - Get an instant picture of your Executives day with Base!

The Base Chrome Extension helps to keep the most pertinent information that EAs need right at their fingertips. As an EA you need context to work efficiently, add the Base Chrome extension to have each new tab automatically open to the Base Dashboard where you can see key timezones, connected calendars, helpful information and a feed of recent activity. You can easily switch to the Dossier to quick copy key information or start a new Digest or Decision Stream to expedite communication. 

Learn more at https://basehq.com
